column3: It seems like that wasnt being used previously?\n

@TheBlueMatt: It IS used, when compiling Bitcoin-Qt on Windows directly via the project file. Even if this was not used by us, it is beneficial to users trying to build from source as a clear indication for static Boost 1.49 libs. I myself rely this btw. ;).\n
ah, sorry, cross compiling sets it manually.\n
Can we do anything about the boost patch we require?\n
@luke-jr Supply a working dependency package and add a small comment?\n
The Boost libs built with `link=static runtime-link=static` specified.\n
